GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

Sort_by query.description: Allows sorting query for the get article endpoint
Sort_by query.response: array with articles sorted by the passed parameter

Order query.description: Allows order query for the get article endpoint
Order query.response: array with articles ordered by the passed parameter

Topic query.response: Array with articles of the passed topic

Limit query.description: Allows for a limit query to be added. Defaults to 10
Limit query.response: Will only display as many items as the limit is set to. Will return an error if the limit is higher than the available data

Page (p) query.response: Will display the default amount (limit) of articles in a page. Next page will display the next number of articles. If a page with no articles is chosen, an empty array will be returned

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object with a key of 'article' of the of the requested article

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: should get all comments for an article

Limit query.description: Allows a limit for how many comments to show to be set
Limit query.response: Will return an array with comment objects the length of the chosen limit.
Limit query.Errors: Will return an error if the limit is below 1 and over 100 or if the limit is not a number

P query.description: Will add the choice to sort through pages
P query.response: Returns items according to the limit, if there are more items, they can be accessed on the next page. If the page is set to more than 1 but there are no comments, an empty array will be returned
P query.Errors: Throws an error if the page query is not a number

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: takes an object with properties 'username' and 'body' and posts a new comment with associated article id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the votes of an article by the article's ID and responds with the updated article

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes a comment by the comment_id, returns status 204 and no response body

GET /api/users.description: fetches all users, if no users present, returns a message

GET /api/users/:username.description: fetches a user by it's username.
